CmdLine: apk add 	curl 	bash 	wget 	git 	openssl 	python 	php7 	php7-common 	php7-fpm 	php7-phar 	php7-pdo 	php7-json 	php7-openssl 	php7-pdo 	php7-iconv 	php7-pdo_mysql 	php7-mcrypt 	php7-mbstring 	php7-opcache 	php7-sqlite3 	php7-pdo_sqlite 	php7-ctype 	php7-zlib 	php7-curl 	php7-gd 	php7-xml 	php7-xdebug 	php7-mongodb 	php7-tokenizer 	php7-session 	php7-xmlwriter 	php7-simplexml 	php7-fileinfo 	php7-dom ;    ln -s /usr/bin/php7 /usr/bin/php;     curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -- --install-dir=/usr/local/bin --filename=composer;     chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer;     composer global require hirak/prestissimo;    rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*;    mkdir -p /var/www &&     echo "zend_extension=/usr/lib/php7/modules/xdebug.so" >> /etc/php7/php.ini
Commands.Name: run
